ttp_template:
<group name="protocol_network_prefix_length_interface">
{{PROTOCOL}} {{NETWORK}}/{{PREFIX_LENGTH}} is directly connected, {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="protocol_network_prefix_length_nexthopip_interface">
{{PROTOCOL}} {{NETWORK}}/{{PREFIX_LENGTH}} via {{NEXTHOPIP}}, {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}, cost 0, age 4237508
</group>
cli_content:
Codes: C - Connected, S - Static, B - BGP, A - Aggregate,
       O - OSPFv3 IntraArea (IA - InterArea, E - External),
       K - Kernel Remnant, H - Hidden, P - Suppressed,
       U - Unreachable, i - Inactive

C         ::1/128                  is directly connected, lo
C         2001:db8:a::/64  is directly connected, eth1-02.100
                                       Comment-Network-1
S         2001:db8:b::/64  via fe80::aaa:65:111, eth1-01.100, cost 0, age 4237508
                                       Comment-static-Route-1
textfsm_template:
Value PROTOCOL (C|S|R|B|O|A|K|H|P|U|i)
Value NETWORK ([0-9a-f:]*)
Value PREFIX_LENGTH (\d{1,3})
Value NEXTHOPIP ([0-9a-f:]*)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value COMMENT (\S.*)


Start
  ^\S\s -> Continue.Record
  # Match regular routes
  ^${PROTOCOL}\s+${NETWORK}/${PREFIX_LENGTH}\s+via\s${NEXTHOPIP},\s${INTERFACE},
  # Match directly connected routes
  ^${PROTOCOL}\s+${NETWORK}/${PREFIX_LENGTH}\s+is directly connected,\s${INTERFACE}
  # Match optional comment, ignore trailing whitespace
  ^\s{39}${COMMENT}\s*$$
